commentaries.commentary: Lewandowski enters as a sub and immediately makes a run on the left!
GOAL! Lewandowski scores after a scramble in the box!
Götze receives the ball and what a back heel pass to Müller! Lewandowski is there...
Here's the replay. That backheel from Götze was sublime, setting up Lewandowski for the finish!
Lewandowski strikes from outside the box! What a hit! The goalkeeper had no chance.
And it's in! Lewandowski again, but this time, a deflection off Benaglio.
Pep Guardiola is ecstatic on the sidelines! What a start for Bayern!
The camera is on a player as the crowd erupts! Red jerseys in celebration, what's happened?
Bundesliga action, and now we see the teams lined up, ready for the restart.
Lewandowski with the pass! Oh, it's in! The goalkeeper couldn't stop that one!
Let's see that replay. He shot from the ground. Amazing play.
GOAL! Bayern Munich's Player 9 strikes from inside the box! A powerful shot, leaving the goalkeeper with no chance!
Here's the replay. Watch the precision and power! Absolutely unstoppable!
The game restarts, Bayern looking to capitalize on their early lead.
